attributes.Title: About La Poire Corporate Group
attributes.Subtitle: Crafting Joyful Moments, One Bite at a Time Since 1975
attributes.Description: Founded on a passion for culinary excellence, La Poire Corporate Group has evolved from the serene Cairo neighborhood of Garden City in 1975 to become the culinary powerhouse that resonates across Egypt with more than 200 stores today. At La Poire Corporate Group, we create experiences that resonate with joy. Join us on this flavorful journey, where ordinary moments turn into extraordinary memories, and simplicity and tradition meets celebration.
attributes.TimelineSubtitle: From Humble Beginnings to National Stardom
attributes.OurVisionDescription: Every day, occasion, and season deserves a moment of joy. Our brands are there to infuse joy in each one of them. We call it Economy of Scope
attributes.OurMissionDescription: To create the simplest yet most elegant pastry, dessert, cafe chains in Egypt.
attributes.StorySubTitle: The Enchanting Tale of La Poire
attributes.StoryDescription:
In the heart of the serene Cairo neighborhood of Garden City, our journey began in 1975 with the opening of our very first store. 

La Poire emerged as a tribute to the rich traditions of French patisseries, infused with the warmth of our Egyptian baking roots. 

Over the years, we've transformed into a household name, celebrated for our exceptional and delectable flair for food.

Our commitment to crafting moments of joy has elevated La Poire to the pinnacle of the patisserie market. 

Consumer-research studies consistently position us as the most iconic, recognized, and consumed patisserie brand in Egypt, with an impressive awareness score of 81%, surpassing any other brand in the market. 

Nearly half of the entire patisserie market has experienced the delight of our products, making us an unrivaled household name.

Regardless of your taste buds' leanings, our offerings promise something fresh and perfectly suited to serve you.

Our pastries and bakery stores are thoughtfully designed with simplicity yet an elegant touch, drawing inspiration from French aesthetics. 

This setup places our delicacies at the forefront, welcoming store visitors into a space where each creation is a masterpiece, and every visit is a journey into the heart of our culinary passion.

Join us in our story, where each creation is a brushstroke on the canvas of culinary artistry, and every moment is an opportunity to savor the essence of La Poire's exceptional and timeless flavors.
attributes.FeaturesSubtitle: The Pillars of Our Prestige: Six Reasons We Shine
attributes.FeaturesDescription: Dive into the essence of what makes La Poire group exceptional. With a tapestry woven from pioneering legacies to unparalleled quality, our unique selling propositions distinguish us in Egypt's culinary landscape. Discover the cornerstones that have shaped our journey, transforming ordinary moments into extraordinary experiences.
attributes.JoyDescription: La Poire's four brands in Egypt symbolize a fusion of joy and happiness in every cherished moment. Through our unwavering commitment, we transform fleeting moments into memorable, delightful experiences.
attributes.TeamSubtitle: La Poire Group, a beacon of culinary excellence in Egypt and the Middle East

Timeline.Title: Birth in Garden City
Timeline.Description: La Poire's first store opens, igniting passion.

Timeline.Title: Cairo Expansion
Timeline.Description: The establishment of La Poire Bistro, cozy casual dining.

Timeline.Title: Brand Diversification
Timeline.Description:
New brand, Beano's Cafe. Where
meaningful connections happen.

Timeline.Title: Rich & Italian Touch
Timeline.Description: The launch of Stavolta Gelato brand. restores purity and truth.

Timeline.Title: Manufacturing Joy!
Timeline.Description: New manufacturing facility. The biggest in the industry.

FeatureItem.Title: Pioneering Legacy
FeatureItem.Description: With roots dating back to 1975, La Poire boasts a time-honored tradition in Egypt, melding expertise with culinary innovation.

FeatureItem.Title: Diverse Portfolio
FeatureItem.Description: Spanning patisseries to cafes, La Poire group's wide-ranging brand lineup offers a comprehensive experience for every palate and preference.

FeatureItem.Title: Quality Commitment
FeatureItem.Description: La Poire stands as a hallmark of premium ingredients, masterful craftsmanship, and a consistent, delightful taste profile cherished by many.

FeatureItem.Title: Cultural Integration
FeatureItem.Description: Merging international culinary flair with Egypt's deep-rooted heritage, the group curates unique offerings that appeal to both local and international tastes.

FeatureItem.Title: Economy of Scope
FeatureItem.Description: With its broad array of brands, La Poire adeptly caters to diverse market demands, ensuring a dynamic and ever-evolving presence in the culinary scene.

FeatureItem.Title: Sustainable Growth
FeatureItem.Description: La Poire's commitment to environmental and societal well-being, coupled with business expansion, ensures a sustainable and positive impact on the communities they serve.

SectionTextImage.Title: Our Factory, Where Dreams Take Shape
SectionTextImage.Subtitle: Excellence Behind the Scenes
SectionTextImage.Description:
La Poire Factory is the heart of our operations, where innovation and tradition converge to create the exceptional flavors that define La Poire. 
Our state-of-the-art facility boasts modern equipment and stringent quality control measures to ensure that every product meets our exacting standards. 
Our factory is where the magic happens, backing masterpieces that delight customers across Egypt.

SectionTextImage.Title: Franchising Opportunities with La Poire Group
SectionTextImage.Subtitle: Be a Part of Something Iconic
SectionTextImage.Description:
Discover the limitless opportunities of business growth and profitability through La Poire's franchise model. 

Come and become part of our growth story and carry forward the tradition of quality and joy we've nurtured for decades.

SectionTextImage.Title: Giving Back to Beloved Egypt
SectionTextImage.Subtitle: Sustainable Practices, Lasting Impact
SectionTextImage.Description: La Poire recognizes the importance of giving back. Our commitment to sustainability and community welfare drives our operations. By integrating eco-friendly practices, supporting local artisans, and participating in community upliftment projects, we ensure that our success is Egypt's success.

attributes.Title: نبذة عن مجموعة شركات لابوار
attributes.Subtitle: نصنع لحظات من البهيجة والسعادة في كل مرة منذ عام 1975
attributes.Description: تأسست مجموعة شركات لابوار على شغف عملاق بالتميز في صناعة الغذاء وخاصة الحلويات، وتطورت من نشأتها في حي جاردن سيتي الهادئ بالقاهرة في عام 1975 لتصبح قوة رائدة في الصناعة لها صدى في جميع أنحاء مصر مع أكثر من 200 متجرًا اليوم. في مجموعة شركات لابوار، نخلق تجارب يتردد صداها بالبهجة. انضم إلينا في هذه الرحلة اللذيذة، حيث تتحول اللحظات العادية إلى ذكريات غير عادية، وتلتقي البساطة والتقاليد بالبهجة والاحتفال.
attributes.TimelineSubtitle: من البدايات المتواضعة إلى شهرة إقليمية ودولية
attributes.OurVisionDescription: كل يوم ومناسبة وحدث خاص يستحق لحظة من البهجة والفرح. توفر علاماتنا التجارية تجارب مميزة لكل منها
attributes.OurMissionDescription: نسعى لإنشاء أبسط وأرقى سلسلة متاجر للحلويات والمخبوزات والمقاهي في مصر
